column1: * 1953 - An issue of the magazine Radio Times 4 December 1953 featuring A Fourteenth-Century Romance by J.R.R. Tolkien
* 1955 - The fourth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Clark.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Roger Verhulst (4 December 1967).
* 2001 - The documentary Master of the Rings: The Unauthorized Story Behind J.R.R. Tolkiens Lord of the Rings is released.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony plays in wikipedia:Newark
* 2012 - Guardians of Middle-earth is released on wikipedia:PlayStation 3 and wikipedia:Xbox 360.
